Function reference

Ratings

Functions to scrape T-Rank

bart_ratings()
Get T-Rank Ratings
bart_conf_factors()
Get Conference Four Factor Statistics
bart_factors()
Get Four Factor Statistics
bart_archive()
Get T-Rank Archive Ratings

Games

Functions to scrape games and results

bart_season_schedule()
Get Full Season Schedule
bart_team_schedule()
Get Team Schedule
bart_pregame()
Get Pregame Probabilities

Player and Game Stats

Functions to scrape player and game stats

bart_player_game()
Get Player Game Stats
bart_player_season()
Get Player Season Stats
bart_transfers()
Get Transfer Portal Statistics
bart_game_box()
Get Team Game Stats
bart_game_factors()
Get Game Four Factors

Team and Conference Stats

Functions to scrape team and conference stats

bart_team_shooting()
Get Team Shooting Splits
bart_team_box()
Get Team Box Stats
bart_team_history()
Get Team History
bart_conf_stats()
Get Conference Team Statistics

Tournament Stats

Functions to scrape tournament stats

bart_tourney_results()
Get NCAA Tournament Results
bart_tourney_sheets()
Get Committee Tournament Sheets
bart_tourney_odds()
Get NCAA Tournament Odds

Miscellaneous Stats

Functions to scrape miscellaneous stats

bart_coach()
Get Coaching History and Notable Recruits
bart_coach_change()
Get Head Coach Changes
bart_injuryimpact()
Get Estimated Injury Impact
bart_poy()
Get Player of the Year Ratings
current_season()
Current Season
